data.name: Puzzle Box
data.detailed_description:
The Puzzle Box currently has:

1. Find Objects -- Search and Find the Hidden Items
2. Word Search -- Search and Find the Hidden Words
3. Rememberry -- Test Your Memory
4. Photo Puzzles HD -- A Good Old Puzzle Game
5. Geo. Quiz -- Test Your Geography Knowledge

6. Spot It -- Find Ten Hidden Differences
7. Word Ninja (Anagram) -- Let's Make Words
8. Zombie Attack (Hangman) -- Guess the Word
9. Find Numbers -- Search and Find the Hidden Numbers
10. Match Pairs -- A Fun and Relaxing Puzzle Game
Features
● Ten games in 1. No downloadable contents (DLCs) required, all games in this collection are fully unlocked!
● Various game modes, tons of difficulty levels
● Thousands of levels from easy to difficult are waiting for you
● Travel the World, Enjoy Virtual Vacation and Discover the Animal Kingdom
● Fun and classic gameplay
● Suitable for both kids and adults
● Hundreds of beautiful HD photos
● Calming music, peaceful atmosphere
● Stunning graphics, cute characters
● Fun sound effects, modern design
● Easy and relaxing to play, hard to master
More details about 10 games in this collection
1. Find Objects
● 7 Difficulty Levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, Challenging, Insane, 7x7, 10x7
● 3 Different Game Modes: Classic, Timed and 20 Seconds
● 1 Adventure Mode (Infinite Levels)
2. Word Search
● 8 Difficulty Levels: 8x8, 10x10, 12x12, 14x14, 16x16, 18x18, 6x6, 7x7
● 2 Different Game Modes: Classic, Missing Letters
● 2 Adventure Modes (1000+ Levels): Travel the World, Animal Kingdom
3. Rememberry
● 7 mini games: Numbers, How Many?, Rememberry, Where are My Fishes?, What are Their Names?, Find the New, Color Sequence
● 2 Game Modes: Classic, Daily Practice
4. Photo Puzzles HD
● 3 Different Game Modes: Tile Swap, Tile Rotation, Split Tiles
● 8 Difficulty Levels: 6x4, 9x6, 12x8, 15x10, 18x12 (Normal), 18x12 (Hard), 21x14 (Normal), 21x14 (Hard)
● Over 750 beautiful HD Photos!
5. Geo. Quiz
● 14 categories: Flags of the World, World Capitals, Cities of the World, Countries of the World, Country Shapes, Culture, Flags of the U.S. States, Maps of the U.S. States, Flags of Europe, Flags of Asia, Flags of Africa, European Country Shapes, Asian Country Shapes, African Country Shapes
● 2 Game Modes: Timed and Normal!
6. Spot It
● 300 "Find the Difference" Puzzles
● 2 Games Modes: Timed and Normal!
7. Word Ninja (Anagram)
● 5 Difficulty Levels: 3-Letter Word, 4-Letter Word, 5-Letter Word, 6-Letter Word, 7-Letter Word.
● 3 Adventure Modes (5000+ Levels): Travel the World, Animal Kingdom, Summer Vacation
8. Zombie Attack (Hangman)
● 5 Difficulty Levels: 4-Letter Word, 5-Letter Word, 6-Letter Word, 7-Letter Word, 8-Letter Word
● 1 Adventure Mode: Animal Kingdom (Infinite Levels)
9. Find Numbers
● 10 Difficulty Levels: 1 to 25, 1 to 50, 1 to 75, 1 to 100, 1 to 150, 1 to 200, Find Numbers (Easy), Find Numbers (Medium), Find Numbers (Hard), Find Numbers (Kids Mode)
● 2 Adventure Modes: Travel the World (Infinite Levels), Animal Kingdom (400+ Levels)
10. Match Pairs
● 7 Difficulty Levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, Challenging, Insane, 15 Pairs, 20 Pairs
● 2 Adventure Modes: Animal Kingdom (Infinite Levels), Summer Vacation (400+ Levels)

data.short_description: Puzzle Box - a collection of ten educational and fun puzzle games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
